original_text: So I turned and came down from the mountain, and the mountain was burning with fire. And the two tablets of the covenant were in my two hands.
korean_text: 내가 돌이켜 산에서 내려오는데 산에는 불이 붙었고 언약의 두 돌판은 내 두 손에 있었느니라

sentences.original_text: and came down from the mountain,
and the mountain was burning with fire.
And the two tablets of the covenant were in my two hands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 언약의 두 돌판은 내 두 손에 있었습니다
